citeinfo.title: State Forest Campgrounds and Day Use Areas

pubinfo.publish: MNDNR - Division of Parks and Trails

descript.abstract: This dataset includes point data for the campgrounds, horse campgrounds, individual campsites, and day-use areas that are located within State Forests and are administered by the Division of Parks and Trails. The data were derived from authoritative sources in the PAT Enterprise Information System.
descript.purpose: The data are primarily used by MNDNR staff to track and manage these resources, and to inform the public as to what resources are available.

timeperd.current: Time Period of Content Date indicates when dataset was last updated. Since new facilities do not often get created and by nature do not move, this data does not need frequent updates. Time Period of Content date indicates the date which the user can be confident of accuracy and completeness of the dataset. Data were last updated in March of 2015.

theme.themekey: structure, state forests, campgrounds, horse campgrounds, campsites, day-use areas, camping, State Forest Campgrounds, Horse Camping, Day-Use Areas, State Forest Campsites

idinfo.useconst: Use of the data are constrained only by the DNR GIS Data License Agreement. See the Distribution Liability section below for a link.

cntperp.cntorg: Minnesota DNR - Parks and Trails, Information Systems Team

procstep.procdesc: This feature class is a derived output of authoritative Divisional data that resides in the PAT Enterprise Information System.

enttyp.enttypd: Attribute table. Field names refer to the actual names of fields in the table; displayed field names (aliases) are defined in the field definition where applicable.

attr.attrdef: Field alias: Facility Name. Name of facility, campground, or Day Use Area.
Field alias: Facility Type. Type of facility or site.
Field alias: State Forest Name. Name of state forest in which this facility exists.
Field alias: County Name. Name of county in which this facility exists.
Field alias: Unit That Administers Facility. Management unit (state park or recreation area) that administers this facility.
Field alias: Administrative Region. Name of DNR Administrative Region in which this facility exists.

distinfo.distliab: The Minnesota Department of Natural Resources General Geographic Data License Agreement is online: www.dnr.state.mn.us/sitetools/data_software_license.html .

stdorder.ordering: Please visit the download page for this dataset on the Minnesota Geospatial Commons website using the web link below (Online Linkage).

cntperp.cntorg: Minnesota DNR - Parks and Trails, Information Systems Team
